00003 #ifndef B3_QUANTIZED_BVH_NODE_H
00004 #define B3_QUANTIZED_BVH_NODE_H
00005 
00006 #include "Bullet3Common/shared/b3Float4.h"
00007 
00008 #define B3_MAX_NUM_PARTS_IN_BITS 10
00009 
00012 typedef struct b3QuantizedBvhNodeData b3QuantizedBvhNodeData_t;
00013 
00014 struct b3QuantizedBvhNodeData
00015 {
00016         //12 bytes
00017         unsigned short int      m_quantizedAabbMin[3];
00018         unsigned short int      m_quantizedAabbMax[3];
00019         //4 bytes
00020         int     m_escapeIndexOrTriangleIndex;
00021 };
00022 
00023 inline int      b3GetTriangleIndex(const b3QuantizedBvhNodeData* rootNode)
00024 {
00025         unsigned int x=0;
00026         unsigned int y = (~(x&0))<<(31-B3_MAX_NUM_PARTS_IN_BITS);
00027         // Get only the lower bits where the triangle index is stored
00028         return (rootNode->m_escapeIndexOrTriangleIndex&~(y));
00029 }
00030 
00031 inline int b3IsLeaf(const b3QuantizedBvhNodeData* rootNode)
00032 {
00033         //skipindex is negative (internal node), triangleindex >=0 (leafnode)
00034         return (rootNode->m_escapeIndexOrTriangleIndex >= 0)? 1 : 0;
00035 }
00036         
00037 inline int b3GetEscapeIndex(const b3QuantizedBvhNodeData* rootNode)
00038 {
00039         return -rootNode->m_escapeIndexOrTriangleIndex;
00040 }
00041 
00042 inline void b3QuantizeWithClamp(unsigned short* out, b3Float4ConstArg point2,int isMax, b3Float4ConstArg bvhAabbMin, b3Float4ConstArg bvhAabbMax, b3Float4ConstArg bvhQuantization)
00043 {
00044         b3Float4 clampedPoint = b3MaxFloat4(point2,bvhAabbMin);
00045         clampedPoint = b3MinFloat4 (clampedPoint, bvhAabbMax);
00046 
00047         b3Float4 v = (clampedPoint - bvhAabbMin) * bvhQuantization;
00048         if (isMax)
00049         {
00050                 out[0] = (unsigned short) (((unsigned short)(v.x+1.f) | 1));
00051                 out[1] = (unsigned short) (((unsigned short)(v.y+1.f) | 1));
00052                 out[2] = (unsigned short) (((unsigned short)(v.z+1.f) | 1));
00053         } else
00054         {
00055                 out[0] = (unsigned short) (((unsigned short)(v.x) & 0xfffe));
00056                 out[1] = (unsigned short) (((unsigned short)(v.y) & 0xfffe));
00057                 out[2] = (unsigned short) (((unsigned short)(v.z) & 0xfffe));
00058         }
00059 
00060 }

00062 
00063 inline int b3TestQuantizedAabbAgainstQuantizedAabbSlow(
00064                                                                 const unsigned short int* aabbMin1,
00065                                                                 const unsigned short int* aabbMax1,
00066                                                                 const unsigned short int* aabbMin2,
00067                                                                 const unsigned short int* aabbMax2)
00068 {
00069         //int overlap = 1;

00074         if (aabbMin1[1] > aabbMax2[1])

00076         if (aabbMax1[1] < aabbMin2[1])
00077                 return 0;
00078         if (aabbMin1[2] > aabbMax2[2])
00079                 return 0;
00080         if (aabbMax1[2] < aabbMin2[2])
00081                 return 0;
00082         return 1;
00083         //overlap = ((aabbMin1[0] > aabbMax2[0]) || (aabbMax1[0] < aabbMin2[0])) ? 0 : overlap;
00084         //overlap = ((aabbMin1[2] > aabbMax2[2]) || (aabbMax1[2] < aabbMin2[2])) ? 0 : overlap;
